metadata.title: CVE-2023-6931 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - high
metadata.description:
A heap out-of-bounds write vulnerability in the Linux kernel's PerformanceEvents system component can be exploited to achieve local privilegeescalation. A perf_event's read_size can overflow, leading to an heapout-of-bounds increment or write in perf_read_group(). We recommendupgrading past commit 382c27f4ed28f803b1f1473ac2d8db0afc795a1b.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-6931` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-3.13.0-173-generic - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-3.13.0-173-generic-lpae - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-3.13.0-173-lowlatency - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-3.13.0-173-powerpc-e500 - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-3.13.0-173-powerpc-e500mc - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-3.13.0-173-powerpc-smp - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-3.13.0-173-powerpc64-emb - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-3.13.0-173-powerpc64-smp - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-unsigned-3.13.0-173-generic - 3.11.0-12.19
linux-image-unsigned-3.13.0-173-lowlatency - 3.11.0-12.19
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-164-generic - 4.4.0-250.284~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-164-generic-lpae - 4.4.0-250.284~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-164-lowlatency - 4.4.0-250.284~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-164-powerpc-e500mc - 4.4.0-250.284~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-164-powerpc-smp - 4.4.0-250.284~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-164-powerpc64-emb - 4.4.0-250.284~14.04.1
linux-image-4.4.0-164-powerpc64-smp - 4.4.0-250.284~14.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-164-generic - 4.4.0-250.284~14.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-164-lowlatency - 4.4.0-250.284~14.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1054-aws - 4.4.0-1127.133
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty/esm, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.11.0-12.19').
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-250.284~14.04.1').
linux-aws package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1127.133').
linux-azure package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
